subject: Programming
title: C Plus Plus
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: C Plus Plus.

hook.text: Bjarne Stroustrup loved C's speed but wanted the safety of organized, reusable code.

buildup.text: In 1979, he began adding object-oriented features to C at Bell Labs.

discovery.text: C++ combined low-level power with classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

twist.text: The language grew so complex that even experts joked nobody truly knows all of C++.

climax.text: Games, browsers, and operating systems still rely on C++ for raw performance.

punchline.text: Power and complexity became one package.
